item.title: Cranberries - Analyse
item.description:

close your eyes

out there

item.title: Cranberries - Dreams
item.description:
Oh my life is
changing everyday
In every possible way
oh my dreams
It’s never quiet
as it seems
Never quiet
as it seems
I know I’ve felt
like this before
But now I’m feeling it
even more because
It came from you
and then I open up
And see
the person falling
Here is me
a different way to be
La la- la- la- la-
I want more
Impossible to ignore
impossible to ignore
And they’ll come true
impossible not to do
Impossible not to do
and now I tell you
Openly
you have my heart
So don’t hurt me
you’re what
I couldn’t find
A totally amazing mind
So understanding
and so kind
You’re everything
to me

changing everyday

oh my dreams

item.title: Cranberries - Promises
item.description:
You better believe
I’m coming
You better believe
what I say
You better hold on
to your promises
Because you bet you’ll
get what you deserve
She’s going to
leave him over
She’s gonna take
her love away
So much for
your eternal vows
Well it does not
matter anyway
Why can’t you stay
here awhile
Stay here awhile
Stay with me
Oh- all the promises
we made
All the meaningless
and empty words
I prayed prayed
prayed
Oh- all the promises
we broke
All the meaningless
and empty words
I spoke spoke
spoke

item.title: Cranberries - Zombie
item.description:
Another head
hangs lowly
Child’s slowly taken
and the violence
Cause such silence
who are we mistaken
But you see
it’s not me
It’s not my family
in your head
In your head
they are fighting
With their tanks
and their bombs
And their bombs
and their guns
In your head
in your head
They are crying
in your head
In your head
zombie zombie zombie
What’s in your head
in your head
Zombie zombie
zombie-

Another mother’s
breaking heart is
Taken over
when the violence
Cause silence
we must be mistaken
It’s the same
old theme
Since nineteen sixteen
in your head
In your head
they’re still fighting
With their tanks
and their bombs
